Moving to a new apartment can give you a headache. You need to move with essential household items and furniture. Also, purchasing new items costs a lot of money. Many people feel stressed while shifting to a new apartment. Are you also one of them? I am going to share some golden tips with you. It will help you to get rid of those hassles. Would you like to make your moving process smooth?

 

Renting a furnished Apartment is the solution for you. While checking rental listings, you might have noticed furnished apartments. Through this article, you will learn how to find the best Furnished Apartment for Rent in Dhaka. Besides, you will know how you can be beneficial by renting a furnished apartment.

 

Getting excited to know about that? Let’s get started.

 

What is a furnished apartment?

 
 

First of all, let me tell you the definition of a furnished apartment. A furnished apartment has essential furnishings and appliances that are the basic needs. The type of furnishing varies in different apartments. It depends on the apartment owner which type of furnishings to include. There are two types of furnished apartments: Semi-furnished apartments and fully-furnished apartments.

 

How to find a furnished apartment for rent in Dhaka?

 

It can be challenging for you to find a furnished apartment for rent in Dhaka that will meet your expectations and budgets. Rents BD can make the process easier for you. Let me tell you the entire process to rent a furnished apartment in Dhaka.

 

  • Set a Budget

You have to define your budget before you start looking for a furnished apartment for rent within Dhaka city or anywhere else. When you have a specific budget set on your mind, you will be able to filter out rental listings that are suitable for you.

 

  • Note Your Requirements

In the 2nd step, you need to take note of your requirements. You have to figure out which type of furnishings are your basic needs. Then, search for a furnished apartment having those facilities. Where to search for the furnished apartment?

 

  • Check Rental Listings

Now, you have to visit rents.com.bd to check the latest rental listings. You can check for Furnished Apartment in Gulshan, Furnished Apartment in Banani, Furnished Apartment in Baridhara Diplomatic Zone, and so on. You have to figure out the listings that fill up your requirements.

 

  • Get Owner’s Contact Number

Have you selected some listings? At this stage, click on the listings and ask for the owner’s contact information. You don’t have to pay anything for that. Within a short time, the Rents BD team will inform you about the owner’s contact information.

 

  • Visit the Apartment

After talking to the owner, you can visit the apartment at your convenient time. Check for the decoration, furniture, appliances, and other facilities. The location should be near to your workplace. It will save you a lot of time. Ask the owner about rents, security amount, and mandatory period to take the lease, other charges, and facilities. If you have selected several listings, inspect all of your selected apartments physically before making the final decision.

 

  • Ask for the Rental Agreement Paper

If everything goes fine, you can ask for the rental agreement paper. The Rents BD team will arrange the agreement paper on behalf of the owner and tenant. We’ll ensure trust and transparency in the rental agreement. It will be a win-win situation for you and the owner. You are going to get the best-furnished apartment for rent in Dhaka within your budget.

 

Benefits of Renting a Fully Furnished Apartment in Dhaka

  • Easy and Smooth Apartment Shifting
  • Reduce Stress
  • Save Time and Money
  • Best for short term stays
  • Easy to Move
  • Nicely Decorated
  • Lower Carry Cost
 

While shifting to a new apartment, most of us have some confusion with choosing the type of apartment. Which type of apartment would be the best option- Fully Furnished Apartment or Unfurnished Apartment? Does the same question pop up in your mind? You are going to get the answer within a few minutes.

 

Read this article till the end to find out the advantages of renting a fully-furnished apartment for rent in Dhaka. Along with this, you are going to know how to find a fully furnished apartment for rent in Dhaka.

 

Can’t wait anymore to explore the benefits? Permit me to start.

 

What does a fully furnished apartment mean?

A fully furnished apartment has all the furniture and appliances that are required to lead a convenient life. You can move to the apartment without purchasing any furnishings. For example, a bed with bedsheets, sofa, chair, table, lighting, fridge, shower, toilet, and other primary home appliances. When you rent a fully furnished apartment, you can start living in the apartment immediately. Everything will be decorated and nicely organized. That sounds great, doesn’t it?

 

Why should you rent a fully furnished apartment in Dhaka City?

 

  • Makes Apartment Shifting Easy

It is difficult to shift your living place with furniture and home appliances. It increases the shifting costs. Also, you need to hire someone to assist you. Moving can be damaging for your furniture. Renting a fully furnished apartment will keep you safe from those hassles.

 

  • Save Your Money

Furniture like Sofa, Luxury Table, Bed, TV, Fridge, Kitchen and Bathroom accessories costs a lot of money. When you choose a fully furnished apartment for rent, you don’t have to spend a lot of money at a time.

 

  • Already Decorated

When you shift to a blank apartment, you have to put a lot of effort into decorating furniture and appliances. You don’t have to follow the process for A fully furnished apartment. You will get everything decorated. Besides, you can customize the decoration if you want. That won’t take too long.

 

  • Best Choice For Short-Term Stays

Sometimes, you search for an apartment to rent for short-term stays like one year or a bit more than that. In that case, my recommendation for you is to choose a fully furnished apartment. While leaving the apartment, you just need to pay off your rent. There won’t be any hassles of moving your furniture.

 

How to find a fully furnished apartment for rent in Dhaka?

 

It can be difficult for you to find a fully furnished apartment for rent that has all the essential facilities. We can feel your problem and are devoted to providing you with a rental solution. All you need to do is visit the rents.com.bd website and search for a fully furnished apartment in Dhaka. You will get the latest apartment lists for rent having your expected facilities. You can search for a fully furnished apartment for rent within any area of Dhaka city.

 

Fully Furnished Apartment for Rent in Gulshan

We can help you to find a fully furnished apartment for rent in Gulshan. Visit the website and set the location “Gulshan”. After that, you have to choose the type of your requirement. That’s it. You will find the listings.

 

Fully Furnished Apartment for Rent in Banani

Search for fully furnished apartments for rent in Banani now to find the apartment that you are looking for. 72+ properties are available currently. Have a look at the listings and ask for the owner’s contact information.

 

Fully Furnished Apartment for rent in Baridhara Diplomatic Zone

You might be searching for a fully furnished apartment for rent in Baridhara Diplomatic Zone. We can feel your expectations. The Rents BD team is devoted to fulfilling your expectations. Choose the best furnished residential spaces in Baridhara from the rental listings.

 

Hear From Us

At this point, you know how to find a fully furnished apartment for rent in Dhaka. Is there anything else the Rents BD team can help you with? Don’t hesitate to call us for any rental queries.

 

We want to make sure that you rent a fully furnished apartment having the required facilities. It would be pleasant for us to assist you with that. Thanks for being here.

 

FAQ

 

Q. Which is the best place to rent an apartment in Dhaka?

Gulshan, Banani, Baridhara diplomatic Zone are some of the best places to rent an apartment in Dhaka.

 

 

Final Word

Hopefully, you knew how to find the best Furnished Apartment for Rent in Dhaka. Rents BD also assist the buyers in finding furnished apartments within Dhaka city. Along with the furnished apartment, you can also look for Commercial Spaces, Office Spaces, and Shop Spaces.

Stay with rents.com.bd to get the latest listings for furnished apartments including 3 bedrooms flat and 2 bedrooms flat for rent. Thanks for being here.
